mapper.select: select p.id, p.phone, p.name, p.address, p.area_code, pr.rate_id, pr.price, ps.service_id, ps.fee_status, ps.price_paid, i.upload_file_name from places p left join place_rate pr on p.id = pr.place_id left join place_service ps on p.id = ps.place_id left join place_image i on p.id = i.place_id and i.role = 'thumbnail' where p.id = #{id}

select p.id, p.phone, p.name, p.address, p.area_code, pr.id, pr.rate_id, pr.price, ps.id, ps.service_id, ps.fee_status, ps.price_paid, i.upload_file_name, CASE WHEN i.role = 'thumbnail' THEN i.upload_file_name END AS thumbnail_file_name, CASE WHEN i.role = 'normal' THEN i.upload_file_name END AS normal_file_name, CASE WHEN i.role = 'price' THEN i.upload_file_name END AS price_file_name from places p left join place_rate pr on p.id = pr.place_id left join place_service ps on p.id = ps.place_id left join place_image i on p.id = i.place_id where p.id = #{id} order by ps.service_id asc ;
mapper.insert: insert into places( name, address, area_code, phone) values( #{name}, #{address}, #{areaCode}, #{phone})
insert into place_service( place_id, service_id, fee_status, price_paid) values( #{placeId}, #{serviceId}, #{feeStatus}, #{pricePaid})
insert into place_rate( place_id, rate_id, price) values( #{placeId}, #{rateId}, #{price})
mapper.update: update places set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, area_code = #{areaCode}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
update place_service set price_paid = #{pricePaid}, fee_status = #{feeStatus} where service_id = #{serviceId} and place_id = #{placeId}
mapper.select: select exists( select 1 from places where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')) as name
mapper.insert: insert into seats (place_id, id, user_id, seat_status, start_time) values (#{placeId}, #{id}, #{userId}, #{seatStatus}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select id from seats where place_id = #{placeId} and seat_status = "Y"
select id from seats where user_id = #{userId} and place_id=#{placeId} and seat_status = "Y"
mapper.delete: delete from seats where id = #{seatId} and user_id = #{userId} and seat_status = "Y"
